project_descr: Security Sector Reform and Small Arms activities to be funded by UNDP/BCPR and implemented within BINUB SSR-SA Section

outputs.output_descr: Relocation of military personnel in army barracks to reduce the instances of violations of the rights of civilians by military personnel and to create a basis for a professional army that respects the rule of law.
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

outputs.output_descr: Le projet vise à permettre à la PNB de contribuer à la consolidation de la paix par la mise en place d'une police de proximité administrée de façon transparente, oeuvrant dans le respect de l'Etat de droit et dotée d'équipements individuels.
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

outputs.output_title: Small Arms JP - US State Dept
outputs.output_descr: To build national capacity for the efficient destruction of small arms and light weapons
donor_name: GOVERNMENT OF UNITED STATES OF AMERICA

outputs.output_descr: Netherlands contribution to relocation of military personnel in army barracks to reduce the instances of violations of the rights of civilians by military personnel and to create a basis for a professional army that respects the rule of law.

• Creation of 2 national databases maintained by the police and army to register and track SALWs in compliance with requirements defined in the Nairobi Protocol for the Prevention, Control and Reduction of Small Arms and Light Weapons (SALW) in the Great Lakes Region and the Horn of Africa
• Establishment of a national ammunitions destruction site
• Establishment of a national facility to shred SALWs
• Rehabilitation of 5 FDN (army) and PNB (national police) armories in order to permit the safe and secure storage of arms stocks in conformity with OSCE recommendations
donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
